Episodes.Title: The New World
Episodes.Plot: Convicted child killer Oswald Danes is executed for his crimes and when he miraculously survives his fate a series of events is set in place that forces CIA Agent Rex Matheson to investigate a global event. His investigation leads him from America to Wales and an old defunct British Institute - Torchwood.

Episodes.Title: Rendition
Episodes.Plot: As the Torchwood team is reunited, Jack realizes he's the most vulnerable man on Earth. A flight to the United States turns into a desperate battle for survival.

Episodes.Title: Dead of Night
Episodes.Plot: Torchwood goes on the run and finds a new enemy, but as they launch a raid on PhiCorp headquarters, Jack must confront the mysterious Oswald Danes.

Episodes.Title: Escape to L.A.
Episodes.Plot: Torchwood relocates to LA to sneak into PhiCorp's headquarters to find some useful information, unaware that their mission has been compromised. Elsewhere, Oswald and Jilly face a new adversary in Ellis Hartley Monroe, who is using the Miracle Day for her own agenda.

Episodes.Title: The Categories of Life
Episodes.Plot: Torchwood goes undercover and discovers the terrible truth behind the Miracle. The enemy is closing in, and death is about to make a shocking return.

Episodes.Title: The Middle Men
Episodes.Plot: With Gwen, Rex and Esther trapped on both sides of the Atlantic, it's a race against time as Jack goes straight to the heart of the conspiracy.

Episodes.Title: Immortal Sins
Episodes.Plot: Gwen must fight to protect her family and takes a terrifying journey, covering both miles and decades, as the long history of the Miracle is revealed.

Episodes.Title: End of the Road
Episodes.Plot: Jack faces a showdown with a man he thought was long since dead, while Rex takes extreme action to prevent the collapse of society.

Episodes.Title: The Gathering
Episodes.Plot: With the whole world in recession, a defeated Torchwood team take their last chance and make a deal with the devil.

Episodes.Title: The Blood Line
Episodes.Plot: As the Torchwood team launch a final, desperate mission against the seemingly undefeatable Three Families, they realize it may come down to the ultimate sacrifice.
